title: My mother publicly insulted me & said lies about me; can I correct her or is this disrespectful?
transcript: ma'am Dewar says my mom insulted me and said lies about me can I correct her or would this be disrespectful if it's something that is connected to you and she has transgressed upon you there is nothing wrong at all in correcting her politely or better more to go to the people and explain to them your case and tell them that this is a lie and this was not true there is no disgrace in it because she's a transgressor and you have the permission to clear your reputation and defend yourself being respectful
